TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 識別匿名使用者是否能設定或存取設定檔屬性。

span.span: Identifies whether a profile property can be set or accessed for an anonymous user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來識別是否可存取的自訂設定檔實作屬性，如果使用者是匿名的使用者。The class is used to identify whether a property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user. 如需啟用匿名識別資訊，請參閱組態項目的提供的文件。For information about enabling anonymous identification, see the documentation provided for the configuration element. 如果沒有指定了不允許設定檔屬性，設定檔屬性的匿名存取。If no is specified for a profile property, anonymous access of the profile property is not allowed. 自訂設定檔實作是繼承自一個類別抽象類別，並定義使用者設定檔中的組態項目未指定的屬性。A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element. 您可以使用應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中指定的自訂使用者設定檔類型`inherits`的組態項目，如下列範例所示的屬性。You can specify a custom user-profile type in the application's Web.config file with the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element as shown in the following example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例定義一個類別，繼承自建立自訂的設定檔。The following code example defines a class that inherits from the to create a custom profile. 已在指定的自訂設定檔類型`inherits`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的組態項目的屬性。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體，並指定是否允許匿名存取相關的設定檔屬性。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies whether to allow anonymous access to the associated profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來識別是否可存取的自訂設定檔實作屬性，如果使用者是匿名的使用者。The class is used to identify whether a property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user. 如需啟用匿名識別資訊，請參閱組態項目。For information about enabling anonymous identification, see the configuration element. 如果沒有指定了不允許設定檔屬性，設定檔屬性的匿名存取。If no is specified for a profile property, anonymous access to the profile property is not allowed. 自訂設定檔實作是繼承自一個類別抽象類別，並定義使用者設定檔中的組態項目未指定的屬性。A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element. ## Examples 下列範例會定義類別繼承自類別來建立自訂的設定檔。The following example defines a class that inherits from the class to create a custom profile. 已在指定的自訂設定檔類型`inherits`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的組態項目的屬性。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. 如需組態檔中指定自訂設定檔實作的範例，請參閱類別概觀。For an example of a configuration file that specifies a custom profile implementation, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]
